title: Swim Speed Up
paragraphs: Swim Speed Up is an ability in the Splatoon series that increases movement speed while swimming in ink.
The number of ability points for Swim Speed Up can be temporarily increased by the following:
The effectiveness of Swim Speed Up is decreased by Ninja Squid.
This ability is especially useful in Ranked Battles when players need to get to certain places quickly.
Swim Speed Up increases movement speed while swimming in squid form and Kraken form.
This ability makes it easier to chase enemies with the Kraken.
The following table shows the speed increase when stacking Swim Speed Up.[1]

- â–² When using weapons that feature lower movement and swim speeds when not firing, such as the E-liter 4K or Dynamo Roller, Swim Speed Up will now grant a significant boost to swim speed, even when using fewer instances of the gear ability than in previous updates.
